snippet.title: RPG Time: The Legend of Wright Announcement Trailer (For Nintendo Switch™・PlayStation🄬4・Steam🄬)
snippet.description:
It's time for adventure!

The award-winning indie title, RPG Time: The Legend of Wright, is coming soon to Nintendo Switch™, PlayStation🄬4, and Steam🄬!

The highly anticipated title that caught the world's attention with its incredible craftsmanship is coming this summer! Head into an epic and handmade adventure with Gamemaster Kenta! 

#RPGTime

-Information
Title : RPG Time: The Legend of Wright
Genre : Handmade Notebook Adventure
Release : 8/18/2022 (Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4)
　　　　9/13/2022 (Steam)
　　　　Now available (Xbox Series X|S・Xbox One・Windows)
Language : Japanese/English/Simplified Chinese
Players : One
ESRB : EVERYONE 10+
Developer : DeskWorks Inc.
Publisher : Aniplex Inc.
Official HP : https://rpgtime-en.com/
Official Twitter : @RPGTimeEN(https://twitter.com/RPGTimeEN)
